data.current_description: Retrieve logs of user actions related to [login activity](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account-management/view-and-export-account-activity-history#account-login-history).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves paginated login activity logs for the HubSpot account, including user login events and authentication details. Supports filtering and sorting via query parameters. Returns a collection of login audit records with pagination support for iterating through results.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity about pagination support, parameter usage, and return structure. Added specifics about pagination, filtering/sorting capabilities, and return format to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when to use this operation and how to handle results.

message: Operation 'get-/account-info/v3/activity/audit-logs' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is too vague and doesn't convey the scope or pagination aspect. Description mentions Enterprise-only restriction but lacks clarity on pagination, parameter usage, and return structure. Improved summary to be more specific and added details about pagination, parameter support, and return format. Changed terminology from 'activity history' to 'critical actions' for consistency with schema naming (HydratedCriticalAction).

data.current_description: Retrieve activity history for user actions related to approvals, content updates, CRM object updates, security activity, and more (Enterprise only). Learn more about [activities included in audit log exports](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account-management/view-and-export-account-activity-history-in-a-centralized-audit-log?hubs_content=knowledge.hubspot.com/account-management/view-and-export-account-activity-history&hubs_content-cta=centralized%20audit%20log#data-included-in-the-centralized-audit-log).
data.summary_suggestion: Get paginated critical action audit logs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves paginated audit logs of critical actions performed in the HubSpot account, including approvals, content updates, CRM object modifications, and security events. Enterprise accounts only. Supports filtering and sorting via query parameters. Returns a collection of hydrated critical action records with pagination support for comprehensive activity history review.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too vague and doesn't convey the scope or pagination aspect. Description mentions Enterprise-only restriction but lacks clarity on pagination, parameter usage, and return structure. Improved summary to be more specific and added details about pagination, parameter support, and return format. Changed terminology from 'activity history' to 'critical actions' for consistency with schema naming (HydratedCriticalAction).
